DataElement.preferredName: Loes Score Assessment Performed Composite Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric composite value measured, assigned or computed related to the assessment of the loes score.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A rating of the severity of abnormalities in the brain found on MRI. It ranges from 0 to 34, based on a point system derived from the location and extent of disease and the presence of atrophy in the brain, either localized to specific points or globally throughout the brain._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Executed and carried through to completion.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A single value that is calculated from multiple scores. This composite score can then be used as a single variable in further analysis and comparison._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
